changeSet.author: ShawnDeng
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_asset` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `checksum` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '整个文件的Hash，MD5摘要', `head_sum` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '资源文件前32个字节的Base64', `file_size` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '文件大小(单位:byte)', `file_url` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '云端文件存放路径', `extension_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '文件扩展名', `is_template` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否是模版附件(0:否,1:是)', `is_deleted` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '删除标记(0:否,1:是)', `create_time` timestamp(0) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, INDEX `idx_digest`(`checksum`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '基础-资源文件表' ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

changeSet.author: ShawnDeng
changeSet.comment: 创建通讯录文件上传解析记录表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_audit_upload_parse_record` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `space_id` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '空间ID(vika_space#space_id)', `file_save_url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '文件保存相对路径', `row_size` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '文件行数', `success_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '解析成功的行数', `error_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '解析失败的行数', `error_msg` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '解析失败详细', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='审计模块-通讯录文件上传解析记录表';
